The primary objective proposal evaluate impact weight loss lifestyle exercise knee osteoarthritis . Participants behavioral weight loss exercise group attend weekly group meeting Johns Hopkins Bayview Medical Center 16 week . Group meeting last 1 hour lead health care professional . Participants teach lose weight keep weight change eat evaluate lifestyle . The primary outcome measure knee pain . Secondary measure include physical disability , quality life , performance measure , long-term adherence behavior change .
